---
title: "upGMT"
---


```
upGMT(up=false)
```

Check if a new GMT (C binaries) version is available. If yes, use `upGMT(true)` to update it.


## Methods

```julia
# 3 methods for generic function "upGMT" from GMT:
 [1] upGMT(up::Bool, auto::Bool)
 [2] upGMT(up::Bool)
 [3] upGMT()
```
